backend/main.mo: Defines sports, betting, subscription, referral, and user profile types, sets up persistent state maps, and includes authorization and Stripe config scaffolding.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend files to aid build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with toast support.
frontend/src/components/AccountProfileEd: Form component allowing users to edit and save their name and email with backend integration.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Wrapper that checks admin status and shows a denial screen for non‑admins.
frontend/src/components/AdminSupportCard: UI card for admins to look up a user's premium status by principal ID and display diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, login button, admin links, and a mobile-responsive menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapping header, footer, and profile-setup modal shown for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/DabbleFormatCard: Formats a prediction into a copyable text block for manual entry on Dabble.
frontend/src/components/HeroBranding.tsx: Hero section with branding, background patterns, and marketing headline.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ManualPremiumGra: Admin card to grant or revoke manual premium access by entering a user's principal ID.
frontend/src/components/PredictionsFilte: Provides sport and sort-order dropdown filters for predictions using Select components.
frontend/src/components/PremiumGate.tsx: Gates premium content based on authentication and subscription status, showing loaders, prompts, or content accordingly.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name and optional email, submitting via useUpdateUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/RedeemReferralCo: Card allowing users to enter and redeem referral codes with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCodesAdm: Admin panel to create, list, copy, and revoke referral codes, including duration handling and status display.
frontend/src/components/ResponsibleGambl: Displays an informational disclaimer about prediction accuracy and responsible gambling.
frontend/src/components/StripePaymentSet: Form for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries using useSetStripeConfiguration.
frontend/src/components/SubscribeCta.tsx: Promotional CTA encouraging users to view pricing and subscribe for premium predictions.
frontend/src/components/TermsAcceptanceG: Gates content until the user accepts terms of service, storing acceptance and showing a summary and checkbox.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivateSubscripti: Provides a mutation to activate a subscription and refresh related queries for immediate UI updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin utilities for checking admin status and mutating depth charts, reports, news flags, coaching styles, and predictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPremiumDiagno: Fetches premium-diagnosis data for a target principal with admin-only access and specific error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualPremiumGrant: Mutation to manually grant premium status to a user and invalidate related subscription and diagnosis queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualPremiumRevok: Mutation to revoke manually granted premium access and refresh subscription and diagnosis data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides queries to fetch predictions globally, by sport, or by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferralCodes.ts: Handles listing, creating, revoking, and redeeming referral codes with appropriate query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestorePremiumAcce: Forces refresh of all premium-related queries without calling the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Supports creating Stripe checkout sessions, checking configuration, and updating Stripe settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Aggregates subscription, profile, and premium-source queries and derives access states and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile with identity-aware loading and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, global layout resets, gradient backgrounds, and utility classes for custom cash-themed colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays user account details, premium status, subscription info, and admin tools, handling authentication, loading states, and access restoration.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface with tabs for Stripe setup, referral codes, manual grants, and editing sports-related data via various mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with feature highlights, pricing intro, and hero branding.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry subscription or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes subscription activation via URL/session parameters, handling authentication, activation state, error messaging, and redirects.
Displays a detailed view of a single prediction, including confidence, sport, market, dates, and risk tier, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PredictionsPage.tsx: Shows a list of predictions with filtering, sorting, risk tiers, and basic metadata, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Provides subscription plan options, validates identity and terms acceptance, and initiates Stripe checkout sessions.
frontend/src/pages/SendSupportPage.tsx: Allows users to copy or open a Cash App link to send support, showing cashtag details and UI interactions.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays Terms of Service content and manages acceptance state stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/riskTier.ts: Calculates a prediction’s risk tier based on winning probability and returns tier metadata.
frontend/src/utils/termsAcceptance.ts: Reads, writes, and clears terms acceptance status from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and sync URL values for persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines the Tailwind CSS setup with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the app theme.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the app’s build and planning workflow.
